topics.body:
Question:
When watching anime, do you sub or dub?

Me? I do both.
Because I can, and it depends on the anime, for me.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c086a663687216a8a00100#post_54c086a663687216a8a00100
I dub when possible (unless the dub sucks)

If I can't dub, then I sub

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c086a663687216a8a00100#post_54c086a663687216a8a00100
Mostly sub. Alot of dubs bother me. It's easier to ignore bad voice acting if I can't understand it.

The reason why I remember that was that it was so incredibly dumb that it was forever burned in the back of my mind as the single dumbest moment on crime shows ever.
